mapper.update: update subject set subject_num = #{subjectNum}, subject_name=#{subjectName}, subject_title=#{subjectTitle}, subject_content=#{subjectContent} where subject_num = #{subjectNum}
mapper.select: select subject_num subjectNum, subject_name subjectName, subject_title subjectTitle, subject_content subjectContent from subject where subject_num = #{subjectNum}
mapper.insert: Insert into subject (subject_num, subject_name, subject_title, subject_content) values (#{subjectNum}, #{subjectName}, #{subjectTitle}, #{subjectContent})
